name: Crazy Pong (semipsych)
description:
Hey guys,

I have been working on this project for 3 days. I just wanted to show you what I did.

Downloadable version of this game is available below.

Game ;
  • 2 players
  • A crazy game camera
System Rquirements;
  • Potato computer
Controls;

Player 1 -> W for up, S for Down

Player 2 -> UpArrow for up, DownArrow for down

I am not a soundtrack creator. This game contains a soundtrack from the game Silver Surfer.

I hope you enjoy the game.
